name: solsend
description: Solana Multi-Send Application - Send SOL & SPL tokens to multiple recipients

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && uvicorn server:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8001" "cd frontend && yarn start"
scripts.deploy:netlify: cd frontend && yarn build && netlify deploy --prod --dir=build
scripts.vercel-build: cd frontend && yarn install && yarn build
